metamodel.description:
Check this to generate class models on leading frameworks.
This Class Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
S-IDE provides the modeler to graphically produce class models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR500 Class

technology.description:
Check this to generate predefined reports associated to the designed objects of your class models.
At runtime, these reports may be instantiated using the Birt report execution environment. These reports may also be customized using the Birt report designer.
S-IDE allows to optimize the generation of reports useful to follow up the lifecycle of the newly designed objects of your application.
technology.name: Birt

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate reports on the release 2.3 of the Birt reporting tool.
Birt 2.3.x is the leading open source reporting tool which may be easily embedded in web framework like Alfresco.
Additionally to content generation, S-IDE provides the generated reports to follow up the lifecycle of the designed objects.

generatorVersion.description:
Check this to generate the Birt reports to integrate to your application.
The generated reports may be deployed in any Birt runtime environment.
S-IDE provides the necessary components to deploy these reprorts through the 'deployer' tab on a Birt runtime environement.

option.documentation:
Check this option to generate the Birt reports.
If not checked, the Birt reports will not be generated.
option.label: Birt Report

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to name of the author of the report.
The author name will be inserted in the generated report templates.
configurationParameter.label: Author

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the version of the generated AMPs, default value is '1.0'.
At Alfresco start, the version is displayed in the console and may easily be checked to ensure good production deployment.
configurationParameter.label: Module version
